# audioSettings

**Instance Property**

The audio settings that the output uses.

## Declaration

```swift
var audioSettings: [String : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

The dictionary must contain values for the keys in [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/linear-pcm-format-settings].

Setting the property value to `nil` indicates that the output returns audio samples in an uncompressed format.

## Inspecting an output

- **audioTracks**: The tracks from which the output reads audio.
